HGE::System_GetState

Returns internal system state value. 

bool System_GetState(
  hgeBoolState state
);

hgeCallback System_GetState(
  hgeFuncState state
);

HWND System_GetState(
  hgeHwndState state
);

int System_GetState(
  hgeIntState state
);

const char *System_GetState(
  hgeStringState state
);

Parameters

state
Member belonging to one of the System states enumerated types. Denotes the desired system state.

Return value

Returns a bool, function pointer, HWND, int, or const char*, depending on the requested system state.

Remarks

See System states section for complete states description.

Requirements

Header: hge.h
Import library: hge.lib

See also

System_SetState, System states
